io.delta.core

Class ScanFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.delta.core.ScanFileReader

  • public class ScanFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods provided by the Delta core to read data and get the scan file status.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FileStatus getFileStatus(Row scanFileInfo)
      Get the FileStatus from given scan file row.
      static CloseableIterator<ColumnarBatch> readData(Row scanFile, Row scanState, ScanEnvironment scanEnvironment, TableHelper tableHelper, StructType readSchema)
      Get the data from a scan file with the given connector's ScanEnvironment and TableHelper implementations.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getFileStatus

        public static FileStatus getFileStatus(Row scanFileInfo)
        Get the FileStatus from given scan file row. FileStatus object allows the connector to look at the partial metadata of the scan file.
        Parameters:
        scanFileInfo - Row representing one scan file.
        Returns:
        a FileStatus object created from the given scan file row.

      • readData

        public static CloseableIterator<ColumnarBatch> readData(Row scanFile,
                                                        Row scanState,
                                                        ScanEnvironment scanEnvironment,
                                                        TableHelper tableHelper,
                                                        StructType readSchema)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Get the data from a scan file with the given connector's ScanEnvironment and TableHelper implementations.
        Parameters:
        scanFile - an instance of Row representing a single scan file. This row is from the ColumnarBatch returned by Scan.getScanFiles()
        scanState - Scan state returned by Scan.getScanState()
        scanEnvironment - Connector specific environment. For Delta core this is an opaque object and its gets passed to given TableHelper.readParquetFile(io.delta.core.fs.FileStatus, io.delta.core.helpers.ScanEnvironment, io.delta.core.ColumnMappingMode, io.delta.core.types.StructType, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String>)
        tableHelper - Connector specific instance of TableHelper.
        readSchema - Select list of columns to read from the scan file. The column names are logical column names exposed in table schema.
        Returns:
        Data read from the scan file as an iterator of ColumnarBatches. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the iterator.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when error occurs reading the data.
